name: Solar Power AI
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Gain a free [Life Creation Lab] [in this city]
quote: If an Artificial Intelligence could bring us through the fallout of a contaminated desert, it can surely lead us on our way to make the wasteland usable again.

civilopediaText.text: If an Artificial Intelligence could bring us through the fallout of a contaminated desert, it can surely lead us on our way to make the wasteland usable again.
